column4: I already got two reasons to switch back to xp, I need to use the new J2ME SDK 3.0 and to transfer mp3's to my GoGear..
sounds like you made a bad mp3 player choice. :/

it supports a 2-deep folder structure. and other devices, like those that runRockbox, have no such limitation. and they don;t demand you run any particular OS on your computer.
